creditline: Gift of funds from Nivin MacMillan
description: bearded man on horseback, with a long straight sword at his waist; horse wears bunch of feathers at the top of its harness between its ears; man carrying halberd running behind; running man has cluster of feathers on his headdress; trees in landscape with castle at center background; small dog in center foreground
inscription: on back at bottom edge, in pencil: 131 Rose in Berlin 1841; on back, in pencil: B [?] 131
signed: bottom center, in the print: AD
title: Knight on Horseback and the Lansquenet
